snippet.title: Sunrise's Order - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer of Sunrise's Order.
Sunrise's Order is now available on Steam: https://bit.ly/3pHSK17

Sunrise's Order is a farm simulation game in which the player is alone on an island, and seeks to become an accomplished small farmer. The player must use a delivery service called Animazon to support the farm and grow the farm's reputation.

Join us in our official discord
https://discord.gg/Y5XjTaWgH9

Misstic Studio is a 2-person independent Canadian video game development studio.
Equipped with a graphics tablet and a keyboard/mouse, we join forces to complete our quest entitled Sunrise's Order. Our games are designed to be charming, colorful and fun, to give players a good time.

Follow us on our different social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MissticStudio
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MissticStudio
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@missticstudio
